title: FS: 1888 Joseph Hall New York Ball Club Giants Cabinets
author: kemdawg

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 Joseph Hall New York Ball Club Giants Cabinets
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is an 1888 Joseph Hall New York Ball Club Giants Cabinets PSA Authentic

There are six hall of famers included on this card:
1. Buck Ewing
2. Tim Keefe
3. John Ward
4. Roger Connor
5. Jim O'Rourke
6. Mickey Welch

Asking price:  $6,250 shipped/insured

Thanks for looking!
Travis—Nice card, but I’m afraid, contrary to what it says on the label, that this is just a cabinet, not an imperial cabinet.
Interesting.  I actually don't know the difference. What is an imperial cabinet vs a regular cabinet?
Imperial cabinet is bigger. The NY Jos Hall imperial cabinet is maroon in color and is very rare. Yours is the typical Jos Hall team version.

Here's a link to one offered by H&S years ago.  According to the listing it measures roughly 20"x19" - [url]https://bid.hugginsandscott.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=147533[/url]

There is also a 3rd size, roughly 10"x8", that has the maroon border Jay references, that was offered by REA - [url]https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=64737[/url]
Actually H & S got it wrong, that is a Mammoth Plate size, the one Jay mentioned is the Imperial Plate size...
That's super interesting.  I had no idea there were different variations of this card.  The prices of those two auctions are staggering!
